ctx: intros D E f H1 H2 x H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment T, U : UniformSpace D, E : T -> Prop f : T -> U H1 : forall x : T, E x -> D x H2 : continuous_on D f x : T H3 : E x Unable to unify "continuous_on D f" with "filterlim f (within E (locally x)) (locally (f x))".

ctx: intros D E f H1 H2 x H3.
exceptions.tactic: destruct (H1 x (locally_singleton x E H3) ε H4) as [P [HP1 HP2]].
exceptions.exn: In environment T, U : UniformSpace D, E : T -> Prop f : T -> U H1 : forall x : T, E x -> D x H2 : continuous_on D f x : T H3 : E x ε : U -> Prop H4 : locally (f x) ε The term "H3" has type "E x" while it is expected to have type "locally x E".

ctx: intros D E f H1 H2 x H3.
exceptions.exn: The reference P was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros D E f H1 H2 x H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment T, U : UniformSpace D, E : T -> Prop f : T -> U H1 : forall x : T, E x -> D x H2 : continuous_on D f x : T H3 : E x ε : U -> Prop H : forall (x : U) (P : U -> Prop), locally x P -> P x x0 : posreal H0 : forall y : U, ball (f x) x0 y -> ε y H4 : forall (x : U) (P : U -> Prop), locally x P -> P x y : T H5 : ball x x0 y H6 : E y Unable to unify "ball x x0 y" with "ε (f y)".

ctx: intros D E f H1 H2 x H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment T, U : UniformSpace D, E : T -> Prop f : T -> U H1 : forall x : T, E x -> D x H2 : continuous_on D f x : T H3 : E x ε : U -> Prop H : forall (x : U) (P : U -> Prop), locally x P -> P x x0 : posreal H0 : forall y : U, ball (f x) x0 y -> ε y y : T H5 : ball x x0 y H6 : E y H7 : forall (x : U) (P : U -> Prop), locally x P -> P x Unable to unify "E y" with "ε (f y)".

original: intros D E f H1 H2 x H3. apply H2. intros ε H4. destruct (H1 x (locally_singleton x E H3) ε H4) as [P [HP1 HP2]]. exists P. split. - apply HP1. - intros x1 x2 H5 H6. apply HP2. apply H5. apply H6.
